author: Shiritoko
message: At first thanks for your hard work. Is there a reason why there is almost no space between the icons and their description? I did´nt file a bug repor because i thought it was quite obious, but know i´m worried because it hasn´t chagend yet.

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message: Indeed, I wonder how I managed to overlook that :(. It should be fixed next week.
